metadata.description: Charles Dickens's holiday classic, A Christmas Carol, is given a fresh twist,with a female Scrooge! Rod Espinosa (The Courageous Princess) adapts and illustrates this story of the miserly Eliza Scrooge, who is visited by the ghosts of the past, present, and future on one fateful Christmas eve.
metadata.name: A Christmas Carol: The Night That Changed the Life of Eliza Scrooge
